backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, character profiles, posts, comments, stories, messages, conversations, and access-controlled CRUD operations using blob storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including pages, components, hooks, styles, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component controlling authentication flow, loading states, and profile setup before rendering the app shell.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main authenticated layout with header, bottom navigation, logout handling, and page routing for home, messages, characters, and profile.
frontend/src/components/AvatarImage.tsx: Reusable avatar component displaying a blob image or generated initials with size variants and custom styling.
frontend/src/components/CharacterFormDia: Modal form for creating or editing a character, handling name, bio, and avatar upload with previews.
frontend/src/components/CommentsPanel.ts: Displays and sorts comments for a post and provides a form to add new comments as the user or a character.
frontend/src/components/CreateConversati: Dialog to start a new conversation by selecting characters and submitting to create a conversation.
frontend/src/components/CreateStoryDialo: Form dialog for creating a story with an image, caption, and selectable author (user or character).
frontend/src/components/MessageThread.ts: Renders a conversation thread with messages, auto‑scrolling, author resolution, and a form to send new messages.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a post with author info, content, image, like button, and an expandable comments section.
frontend/src/components/PostComposer.tsx: UI component for creating posts with text, optional image upload, and selectable author, sending data via createPost.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting the user to enter and save their profile name using saveProfile.
frontend/src/components/StoriesRow.tsx: Scrollable row showing stories, allowing creation of new stories and opening story viewer dialogs.
frontend/src/components/StoryViewerDialo: Dialog that displays a story image, caption, author info, and timestamp.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, and identity lifecycle handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, characters, posts, stories, and related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive color variables for light and dark themes plus custom scrollbar styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Characters.tsx: Displays, creates, edits, and deletes character profiles with UI cards and a character form dialog.
frontend/src/pages/HomeFeed.tsx: Shows a stories row, post composer, and a sorted feed of posts with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/Messages.tsx: Lists conversations, opens message threads, and provides a dialog to start new chats.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Renders user profile settings with avatar upload, name/bio editing, and save handling.
frontend/src/pages/SignIn.tsx: Displays a styled sign‑in screen using Internet Identity with branding and login button states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, including features, requirements, image needs, and architectural notes for a retro-themed private social app.
